ContactaText2: And get personalized advice for your project.
ContactoOperamos: WE OPERATE 24/7 THROUGHOUT THE MEXICAN REPUBLIC
ContactoText: We are at your service, leave us your name and contact information and an advisor will contact you.
HeroText: We are manufacturers of solutions for prefabricated data centers, power and cooling, industrial cabinets and electrical power shielding.
Soluciones1Points: • Prefabricated data centers • Micro data centers • IT cabinets
Soluciones2Points: • Power Distribution Unit (PDU) • Automatic Transfer Switches (ATS) • Mechanical Bypasses • Battery Cabinets (VRLA-NiCad-Lithium)
Soluciones3Points: • Precision cooling around the perimeter, row, wall, rack
